content: looking for the perfect mitten that keeps your hands warm and lets you free your fingers to type or text in this video we ll knit a cozy pair of flip-top mittens from start to finish using double-pointed needles dpns this is a great project for confident beginners and intermediate knitters who want a practical customizable accessory whether you re knitting for yourself or making a thoughtful handmade gift these mittens are warm functional and fun to create
